concept.title: Alternative targets
concept.shortdesc: The websphereEAR target builds an application .ear file that contains both the web client and the application. You can also build an application .ear file that contains only the web application or only the server application.

conbody.p: You might need these configurations where the web client and server application need to be installed on separate servers. For example, to support secure access to the application for external users a new web client application can be developed. This web application can be deployed on its own and use an existing server application. For more information about External Access Security, see .
